subject: Sequential shifter
description_text:
Hi guys,

I've recently bought a set of Your products (pedals, hamdbrake, shifter,
haptic motors) - order No.#SSN2305. I' ll be honest - I didnt use shiter
much during this shirt period of time, but today wanted to drive some rally
simulators and suddenly my shifter lost resistance - I opened shifter with
a hope that I could find some simple solution, however it turned out that a
spring is broken.

I attached some photos of shifter and s/n on the box.

Is there any recommendations how it would be possible to fix this issue?

Kind regards,
Arnis
+371 26121016

conversations.body_text: Hi Arnis Jurševics,    We will send you a replacement sequence spring today. Once you receive it, we will provide you with a video guide to help you replace it.

Thank You for a quick response!

I'll be waiting for new spring.

service@simsonn.com
Hello, we've arranged a replacement for you. Here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2525900704631202

Hi,

I see that the spare part is very close and I would like to ask if You
could share video tutorial how to replace sequential shifter spring?


Kind regards,
Arnis

service@simsonn.com
